title: Android app deals of the day: The Almost Gone, Package Inc, Peppa Pig Sports, more
content:
It’s Friday afternoon and that means it’s time to head into the weekend with all of the best Google Play Android app deals. But first, go check out this deal on the Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 and rare price drops on official Google Pixel 6/Pro cases, then head back here for all of your software needs. Today’s collection has a number of notable standouts including The Almost Gone, Package Inc, Traffix, Codex of Victory, Peppa Pig: Sports Day, and more. Head below the fold for a closer look at today’s best Android app deals. 

more…
